text: H all, I’m assuming this is something that I just can’t find in the documentation, but can someone tell me how we managed upgrades/migrations with marketplace themes? For example theme v1 may have a certain set of parameters, but in v2 those parameters might have been renamed or grouped differently. How do we make sure that pages know how to map those to the correct parameter?
<@U7SL518D6> Are you kidding mate?? This is amazing.... I need this result in my website, please can you tell me what method did you use?
